detectors.description: token (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#76) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:token.transfer(address,uint256) (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#76)

Reentrancy in SendTokensContract.withdrawTokens() (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#116-121):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,bals[msg.sender]) (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#119)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bals[msg.sender] = 0 (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#120)
	SendTokensContract.bals (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#80) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- SendTokensContract.bals (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#80)
	- SendTokensContract.sendTokens(address,uint256,uint256,bytes32) (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#95-104)
	- SendTokensContract.withdrawTokens() (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#116-121)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [SendTokensContract.withdrawTokens()](0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#L116-L121):
	External calls:
	- [tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,bals[msg.sender])](0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#L119)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [bals[msg.sender] = 0](0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#L120)
	[SendTokensContract.bals](0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#L80) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [SendTokensContract.bals](0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#L80)
	- [SendTokensContract.sendTokens(address,uint256,uint256,bytes32)](0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#L95-L104)
	- [SendTokensContract.withdrawTokens()](0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#L116-L121)

detectors.description:
SendTokensContract.withdrawTokens() (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#116-121) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now >= releaseTimes[msg.sender]) (0x42a4a749123469ca6a8b6ca494b1953076a26ef7.sol#118)
